about_the_game:
DreamBreaker is a turn-based card-based building game with rogue.

The Demon Lord is awakening, and you must find the Demon Lord's hiding place and improve yourself as much as you can within a limited time, sealing it again before it fully regains its challenge after challenge, you collect scattered memories and find the truth of this world!

In each game, you can choose different companions and exploration routes to find different skills and items. Experience the ever-changing world of building through different combinations!

Dual-skill cards

Each card can be equipped with 2 skills, and choose 1 of them to cast when played. Think and make choices based on the battle situation

Time-Order

Planned skills will be resolved sequentially during the action phase. Acting before or after the enemy is also part of the strategy!

Hero Team

Choose 1 main attack and 2 support characters for each game. Different fighting styles, and wonderful combinations create wonderful sparks!

Choose Route

The ultimate goal is to defeat the Demon Lord. There are no prescribed game routes, so you can freely choose the map you want to explore, so that every adventure and every build is different!

Boss Fights

Dozens of well-choreographed boss fights. Test your build to be up to the task! And bosses have their own unique loots to enrich your build!

The awakened Demon Lord

The Demon Lord gradually becomes stronger with time. Spend less time facing weaker demon lords, or spend more time becoming stronger yourself!
